messages.content: Stewart has now been elected to represent this constituency at four elections. He has served on the UK Parliament’s Intelligence and Security Committee and speaks for the SNP on the important subject of International Trade. Born and brought up in the constituency, he is committed to helping local people. Since he was first elected Stewart has held well over 1000 advice surgeries and helped around 25,000 local people. Stewart says: I hope that you will be able to join us, stand up for Scotland, and say no to a damaging ‘no-deal’ Brexit.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Stewart says: I hope that you will be able to join us, stand up for Scotland, and say no to a damaging ‘no-deal’ Brexit. We need to protect jobs and investment.
